Class ComposedShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ComposedShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, Shape

    public class ComposedShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    ComposedShape class represents one shape being fitted in a container shape. ComposedShape class implements Shape interface's methods.
